cause.description:
Hoover Long is a senior at Huntington High school, in desperate need. He has a major problem, something he needs so immediately, that it could cause his whole world to collapse if he doesn't get it. He needs a slushie machine in his room, preferably and icee machine. You see, Hoover is a very dedicated, loving young samaritan in dire need of assistance. With your help we can buy him a slushie machine to let him live out his main dream in life. Thanks
1. Maintaning a healthy slushie diet for Hoover Long
2. Stop Bueracracy in Northern Canada and in the DMV
3. Get Hoover laid
cause.mission: buy the best slushie machine out there for Hoover Long's room
cause.name: Slushie Machine for Hoover
